mdRecord.dcterms:title: Group Photograph of Fire Fighters
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Fire fighters group photo in front of the fire department building, starting with the back row from left to right then the front from left to right we have the following fire fighters: Mike Glass, Marshall Dooley, Bill Price, Captain Ron Milton, Charlie Hartman, Todd Rosenberry, Kenny Gibson, Charlie Kirk, Lawrene Keffer, Penny Taylor, and Steve Dixon, undated
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Fire departments
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
